entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
